鷖字的基本解释

鷖
yī
见“鹥”。

鷖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yī］
［《廣韻》烏奚切，平齊，影。］
“鹥1”的繁体字。
鸥的别名。
[②]［yì］
［《集韻》壹計切，去霽，影。］
“鹥2”的繁体字。
(1)传说中的鸟名。凤凰之属。
(2)青黑色的缯。参见“鷖2緫”。

鷖字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷖； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1499第06
【唐韻】烏雞切【集韻】【韻會】煙奚切，?音翳。水鳥。鷗也。一名水鴞。【說文】鳧屬。【埤雅】鳧好沒，鷖好浮。【正字通】鷖，蒼黑色，羣飛鳴，隨潮往來，曰信鳧，知風起，輒飛至岸，渡海者以爲?。【詩·大雅】鳧鷖在涇。又通作翳。【司馬相如·上林賦】拂翳鳥。【註】同鷖。又【山海經】九疑之山有五采之鳥，名曰鷖。【又】蛇山有鳥，五色，飛蔽日，名鷖鳥。又鳥似鳳。【屈原·離騷】駟玉虬以乗鷖兮。【王逸註】鷖，鳳皇別名。身有五彩文，如鳳皇。又【集韻】一計切，音医。靑黑色也。【周禮·春官·巾車】彫面鷖總。【註】鷖總者，靑黑色，以繒爲之。【疏】取鳥之鷖色靑黑爲義。

鷖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷖字的起名意思

暂无。

鹥
Basic explanation of words
鹥
yī
See "鹥".
鹥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yī］
["Guang Yun" Wu Xi cut, level, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "鹥1".
The alias of the gull.
[②]［yì］
["Ji Yun" one plan to cut, go to Ji, shadow. ]
"鹥2" in traditional characters.
(1) The legendary bird name. The genus of the phoenix.
(2) Blue-black strips. See "鹥2緫".
鹥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹥; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1499 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Black-bone chicken cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Smoke Xi cut,? Yin Yi. Waterfowl. Gull also. A water owl. 【Said the text】The genus Melanie. [Pian Ya] Isn't the mallard so good? It's so floating. [Zhengzitong] 鹥, blue and black, the group flies and sings, moving with the tide, saying that the letter is a mallard, knowing the wind, flies to the shore, the person who crosses the sea thinks?. 【Poetry·Daya】The mallard is in Jing. Also pass as a shadow. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Flick bird. [Note] The same as the 鹥. Also【Shanhaijing】There are five-picking birds in the mountain of nine doubts, and the name is 鹥. [Also] The Snake Mountain has birds with five colors, flying to cover the sun, and it is called a snaking bird. Birds are like phoenixes. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】Simple jade scorpion can ride on the scorpion. [Wang Yi's Note] Shi, another name for Fenghuang. The body has colorful writing, like a phoenix emperor. Also 【Jiyun】One plan, music doctor. It's black also. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Towel Car】General Carved-faced Shaw. [Note] The total number of 靑 is black, and it is made of strips. 【Sparse】It is right to take the color of the bird's 靑 black.
